signupContent.title: Get an Instant Quote and Purchase Coverage

form.checkbox1Label: I understand and agree to the use of application agreement.
form.checkbox2Label: I understand and agree the information submitted will be used in line with our privacy policy.

errors.passwordMinCharacters: Password must be a minimum of 8 characters
errors.passwordMinSpecialCharacter: Password should contain at least one special character from ^$*.[]{}()?-+_|'<>,"!@#%&\/
errors.passwordUppercaseCharacters: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase alphabet
errors.passwordLowerCharacters: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase alphabet
errors.passwordNumericCharacters: Password must contain at least 1 numeric character
errors.phoneNumberMinLength: Phone number must be 10 digits long.
